author: Preston Davis
comment: Really, really like the look and feel of this watchface. Only thing I feel it is missing is custom backgrounds. The choices there are great, but having the ability to apply a custom background would be awesome! Maybe even different font options? Otherwise, works and feels great on my LG G Watch paired with my S6 edge!
title: One step away from being my default.

author: Patrick Zbašnik
comment: This watch face is not showing on my Nexus 5 (OS 5.1) or Samsung Gear Live (OS 5.0.2).  I restarted the watch and phone, but with no luck.  I also uninstalled and then reinstalled the watch face and Android Wear apps, but that also did not help the issue.  I do like the watch face concept.  CAN I PLEASE GET A REFUND?
title: This watch face is not showing...

author: Matt Price
comment: It worked for a few seconds when I first installed it, but then gave me a force close and then just stays on a generic face. When I choose a different face, then go back to this one, it gives me 2 force closes, then goes back to that generic face. Please fix this problem. I would love to use it
title: Does not work

author: Robert Reber
comment: I tried to buy and use this watch face after the first time it kept crashing. The watch face work with running and I'm able to make changes. Very beautiful face! Running nexus 6 (at&t) and moto 360
title: Bought it again , and it works now (360)

author: A.J. Hartless
comment: I love the look of this watch face, but ever since the first time I tried to customize on my Moto 360, it crashes every time I try to set it. If that gets fixed it will be great.
title: Looks great, works bad

author: Ryan Keshock
comment: This is a really nice watch face, one of my favorites so far, but it has some stability issues and crashed a couple times during setup. Barring that, the personalization options are very nice, although I'd love to see an option added to have accent color in always-on mode to make it a bit less bland.
title: Nice but with some flaws

author: Marcos Crane
comment: Once you change from the default, the app will crash no matter what. Not recommended for moto 360. Complete waste of your money
title: Crashes 100% of the time

author: Rick Goff
comment: Now it just crashes
title: Displayed for a bit

author: Doug McClure
comment: Love the design. Crashes to the point of being unusable

author: Daymek V
comment: Using on moto 360: seems when I select certain watch faces the app crashes and won't load. Reinstalling fixes this until you try to use the face again. Will continue testing.
title: Bugs

author: Jack M
comment: On my s5 and moto 360 every time I try to change my watch face it crashes. But don't buy the app not worth it.
title: Bugs

author: Ryan Dougherty
comment: I tried to customize and now it just force closes. Can't even get back to default. I wish I could get it refund. DO NOT PURCHASE.
title: DO NOT PURCHASE! Crashes every time.

author: Brad Lucas
comment: Crashed immediately upon selecting it. Would look fantastic if it didn't crash.
title: Doesn't work. Constant crashes.

author: Michael Helsel
comment: A great looking, well thought out watch face with plenty of customization options, but it force closes whenever I apply an analog watch face. 5 stars in anticipation of the fully functional version.
title: Amazing Looking!

author: Sunny
comment: I'm impressed. Use it as my fault watch face. Striking colors when screen is activated and a black and when move when my LG G watch is in power save mode. No adverse effect on battery life. I'm very happy with this purchase.
title: Works really well

author: Corbin Davenport
comment: Works fine on my Moto 360 and Gear Live, it would be nice if you could pick your own background images though.
title: Pretty good

author: Zack Dea
comment: Cannot see more than one watch face ?

author: Adam Boban
comment: Please fix this!
title: Keeps crashing on my Moto 360

author: Casen
comment: I downloaded it but it would not show so I waited 1 day still won't show now the refund period is over
title: Plz refund

author: Jeremy Ambrosio
comment: Plenty of options to choose from, not having crashing issues with One Plus and Moto 360
title: Clean Interface

author: Roberto Richardson
comment: Not too shabby. Plenty of wallpapers, although I wish they had more styles of text
title: Not bad.

author: Corey Ogburn
comment: I do wish there was an option to randomize the faces and backgrounds every so often.
title: Works and looks great.

author: Jaspa Swinnerton
comment: I downloaded I can't use it can't open it
title: Please fix

author: Adam Westerholm
comment: Looks like it downloads but doesn't show up on watch or phone.
title: Cannot open

author: Allan Moore
comment: Poly watch faces is not showing
title: Not showing

author: Dag Haggmark
comment: Paid for it and it won't appear...

author: Devin Kime
comment: This is a great watch face with tons of combinations
title: Great watch face

author: Daniel Pang
comment: this is my favorite watch face so far
title: My favorite watch face

author: Shai Barack
comment: Beautiful and simple.

author: Patrick Malone
comment: I initially enjoyed this, but one watch face seemed to completely crash it and was unable to reload. Refunded and uninstalled. Would purchase again if fixed.
title: Crashes with Moto 360

author: Saul Chavez-Hernandez
comment: Downloaded it, but it never showed up as a watchface. Disappointed 😞
title: Never showed up

author: Karl C
comment: Moto 360, 5.1 - faces look good and I want it to work, but after I tried customizing, it crashed an never worked again. Please fix! But for now refunded and uninstalled.
title: Crashes

author: Андрей Алешин
comment: Crashed and did not recover even after reboot
title: Craches

author: ashish kansal
comment: I purchased even liked it but then it crashes so has to refund it using on moto 360
title: Crashed

author: Nick Saldana
comment: I installed it and it was not available on my watch or the android ware app (refund)
title: Derp

author: Luke Danielson
comment: Never worked
title: Poor app

author: Sergio Pacheco
comment: I serch and the app never opened and that never showed up
title: The app never loaded
